locations: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur, Mexico
imdb.plot outline: This original series was Directed by Clinton Colin Graham Walker and was filmed on location throughout the US capturing some amazing, never before seen action sports content. Absolute X features the following sports: surfing, skiing, snowmobile, snowboard, kite board, wake board, jet skiing, motor-cross, BMX, skateboarding, and wake surfing. Absolute X is shot in (HD) High-Definition. This fun youth sports series is narrated with a light and witty voice actor and is formatted for all audience types. Absolute X was distributed by Marker Entertainment, Directed by Clinton Graham Walker and edited by Cory Sparkuhl.
imdb.title: Absolute X
plot: Features insane stunts and tricks with emphasis on a variety of extreme sports and lifestyle.::Clinton Walker

This original series was Directed by Clinton Colin Graham Walker and was filmed on location throughout the US capturing some amazing, never before seen action sports content. _Absolute X_ (qv) features the following sports: surfing, skiing, snowmobile, snowboard, kite board, wake board, jet skiing, motor-cross, BMX, skateboarding, and wake surfing. _Absolute X_ (qv) is shot in (HD) High-Definition. This fun youth sports series is narrated with a light and witty voice actor and is formatted for all audience types. _Absolute X_ (qv) was distributed by Marker Entertainment, Directed by Clinton Graham Walker and edited by Cory Sparkuhl.::Executive Producer
